"""Test create_storage_group disable compression allocate full."""
storage_group_name = self.generate_name('sg')
storage_group_details = self.provisioning.create_storage_group(self.SRP,
    storage_group_name, self.SLO, do_disable_compression=True,
    allocate_full=True)
self.addCleanup(self.delete_storage_group, storage_group_name)
self._validate_storage_group_details(storage_group_name, storage_group_details)
